summary: JSON Web Token implementation in Python
notes:
I used the example from the [PyJWT docs](https://pyjwt.readthedocs.io/en/stable/) to ensure it works:

```python
import jwt  # Note, this is not the same as the package name.
# If we reach this point, the import was successful.
print("â Successfully imported pyjwt!")
encoded = jwt.encode({"some": "payload"}, "secret", algorithm="HS256")
print(encoded)
jwt.decode(encoded, "secret", algorithms=["HS256"])
```

**Please note: you need to ensure the `ssl` package is also installed for PyJWT to work.**
